name: Creamy PHILADELPHIA® Pasta Primavera
author: Philadelphia
summary: Penne pasta is combined with boneless chicken breast, red bell pepper, fresh asparagus, and zucchini in a cream sauce.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons KRAFT Light Zesty Italian Dressing
1 ½ pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 ½ cups cut-up fresh asparagus (1-inch lengths)
4 ounces PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat Cream Cheese, cubed
¼ cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese
directions: Cook pasta as directed on package
Meanwhile, heat dressing in large skillet on medium heat
Add chicken and vegetables; cook 10 to 12 min
or until chicken is cooked through, stirring frequently
Add broth and cream cheese; cook 1 min
or until cheese is melted, stirring constantly
Add chicken and vegetable mixture; toss lightly
